doc:
Carl Voss (film extra) https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Carl_Voss_(film_extra) 0 Carl Voss (6 May 1896 – 18 September 1947) was an American World War I veteran who besides appearing as a film extra and military film technical advisor commanded a private army of up to 2112 former servicemen who acted as extras in 232 films from 1923 to 1940. Carl_Voss ( 6_May_1896 – 18_September_1947 ) was an_American_World_War_I_veteran who besides appearing as a_film_extra_and_military_film_technical_advisor commanded a_private_army of up_to_2112_former_servicemen who acted as extras in 232_films from 1923 to 1940 .
